Chinese.Description: 前置为温度；触发时会立刻清空玩家的正温度，并全部转移到附近其他生物上，冷却时间30秒。当玩家的温度打积累到危险值时，buff会自动触发。自动触发时冷却时间45秒。

English.Description: Bind with Temperature; When triggered, it immediately clears the player's positive temperature and transfers it all to other nearby creatures, 30 second cooldown.The buff triggers automatically when the slugcat's temperature reachs a dangerous value. Cooldown is 45 seconds when triggered automatically.
